ascend_skill.desc:
Increase chance of being targeted by attacks, and when attacked, activate Desperado.
At the end of Shun's action, Desperado ends, and he restores 30% HP.
ascend_skill.name: Wild Runner

ascend_skill.desc: When Desperado is active, decrease damage taken by 8%.
ascend_skill.name: Steely Endurance

ascend_skill.desc: When remaining HP is below 50%, increase healing effect by 25%.
ascend_skill.name: Bloodspray

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Icicle Hatchet and Smash Hit by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Man of Integrity

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Decrease party's damage taken by 16% for 2 turns.
ascend_skill.name: A Man's Back

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Icy Defense and Thief Tactics by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Masterful Cutting Skills

ascend_skill.desc: When attacking a foe while Desperado is active, deal bonus damage equal to 10% of Shun's max HP, and restore HP equal to damage dealt.
ascend_skill.name: Robbing and Smuggling

highlight_skill.desc:
Increase party's max HP by 10.3% of Shun's max HP for 2 turns (up to 14100/14100/15600/15600) and restore party's HP by 10.1%/11.1%/10.5%/11.5% of Shun's max HP.
Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 75.3%/83.1%/78.4%/86.2% of Shun's max HP.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 55.6%/61.3%/57.9%/63.6% of Shun's max HP. 70% chance to inflict Freeze.
normal_skill.name: Icicle Hatchet

normal_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 56.9%/62.7%/59.2%/65.1% of Shun's max HP. Decrease Defense by 30.0%/30.0%/31.2%/31.2% for 2 turns.When Desperado is active, increase effect by 59.9%/59.9%/62.4%/62.4%.
normal_skill.name: Smash Hit

normal_skill.desc:
Increase party's max HP by 15% of Shun's max HP (up to 14100/14100/15600/15600) for 2 turns.
Also, restore party's HP by 16.5%/18.2%/17.2%/18.9% of Shun's max HP.
Greatly increase Shun's chance of being targeted by attacks for 2 turns.
Cooldown Time: 1 turn.
normal_skill.name: Icy Defense

passive_skill.desc: Increase ammo for ranged attacks by 18. When attacking foes with ranged attacks, 10.0% chance to deal bonus damage equal to 9% of Shun's max HP, and decrease foe's Defense by 35% for 3 turns. Consecutive ranged attacks against the same foe will deal decreased damage.
passive_skill.name: Daunting Firepower

passive_skill.desc: When Shun is attacked while Icy Defense is active, 30.0% chance to activate Desperado.
passive_skill.name: For Your Benefit
